SignUp.title: Sign Up
SignUp.subTitle: Dear user, you can easily create your account
SignUp.name: Name
SignUp.userNameValidateLong: User name must be 3 or more characters long
SignUp.lastNameValidateLong: Last name must be 3 or more characters long
SignUp.passwordvalidate: Password must be 8 or more characters long
SignUp.confrimPassword: Confrim Password must be 8 or more characters long
SignUp.passMatch: password and confirm password do not match.
SignUp.passRules: The password must have at least 8 characters and one uppercase letter and one number
SignUp.successMessage: Your account has been successfully created!
